Name: M4A3 Service Pistol
Description: This inexpensive 9mm pistol is the standard sidearm of the USCMC. You should always have a backup for your backup, and this pistol might as well be it.

Name: .357 Magnum
Description: A classic high caliber revolver, equally popular amongst both Frontier Marshals and lowlifes.

Name: Rexim EVA Pistol
Comment: █▌ARMOR PIERCING▐█ Target's Armor Rating is halved (rounded up) against this weapon.
Description: A miniaturized and weaponized version of a Weyland-Yutani laser welder in use from the 2100-2120s. This tool was originally improvised as a weapon by the J'Har rebels during the 2106 uprising on Torin Prime. Always one to find profit in anything, Weyland-Yutani studied the modifications after the war and made them the standard self-defense armament on their commercial fleet.

Name: Watatsumi Bolt Gun
Comment: █▌ARMOR PIERCING▐█ Target's Armor Rating is halved (rounded up) against this weapon.\n\n█▌SINGLE SHOT▐█ You must reload (Slow Action) after every shot.
Description: The DV-303 is a construction tool that uses expanding bolts to make emergency hull repairs. The DV-303 can be turned into an improvised weapon—firing bolts like a single round shotgun—a trick first used by Frontier rebels in the early 2100s.

Name: M41A Pulse Rifle
Comment: █▌ARMOR PIERCING▐█ Target's Armor Rating is halved (rounded up) against this weapon.\n\n█▌FULL AUTO▐█ You can fire long bursts of full auto fire: +1 Stress, +2 Attack, and any additional [6]s beyond the first may be distributed among any number of secondary targets within Short range of the primary target, either to deal full weapon damage and/or to purchase Stunts.
Description: The standard issue weapon of the USCMC, the M41A Pulse Rifle is a 10mm automatic assault rifle with underslung 30mm pump-action grenade launcher combined in a sturdy housing with retractable stock and optional scope. The M41A fires explosive-tip caseless standard light armor-penetrating US M309 rounds accelerated via electronic pulse. Remaining ammo is tracked via an LED counter and the rifle has two firing modes—burst and full automatic. For more about the grenade launcher, see its weapon card. An otherwise reliable weapon, the M41A can jam when fully-loaded, so partially loaded magazines are recommended. (In their downtime on mission Marines will take the time to remove a few rounds from each of the magazines they carry.) Even with this flaw, the M41A is what you want slung over your shoulder—but if you are a civilian, good luck getting a permit to own one.

Name: Pulse Assault Rifle
Comment: █▌FULL AUTO▐█ You can fire long bursts of full auto fire: +1 Stress, +2 Attack, and any additional [6]s beyond the first may be distributed among any number of secondary targets within Short range of the primary target, either to deal full weapon damage and/or to purchase Stunts.
Description: The UPP equivalent to the M41A Pulse Rifle, the AK-4047 is a cheap and reliable substitute. While not as accurate, the AK-4047 is much sturdier than the USCMC weapon. An AK-4047 still works after being thrown off a cliff and left underwater for a month.

Name: M42A Scope Rifle
Comment: █▌ARMOR PIERCING▐█ Target's Armor Rating is halved (rounded up) against this weapon.
Description: Equipped with a folding bipod, muzzle flash suppressor, and a fully adjustable stock, the M42A is USCMC's semi-automatic electronic pulse sniper rifle of choice. If you manage to see what's lurking in the shadows before it sees you, you go ahead and take the shot.

Name: 12 Gauge Shotgun
Comment: █▌ARMOR DOUBLED▐█ Target's Armor Rating is doubled against this weapon.
Description: A classic pump-action combat shotgun, the M37A2 is an optional weapon in use by the USCMC. Reliable and direct, the '37 is the gun you want to keep handy for close encounters.

Name: Harpoon Gun
Comment:
█▌GRAPPLE▐█ On a hit with this weapon, the grappling hook attaches to the target. 
    ►If the target is heavier than you, you can use the tether to rappel quickly toward the target (slow action, moves you from MEDIUM range to ENGAGED). 
    ►If you are heavier, you can instead pull the target toward you (requires a STRENGTH vs. STRENGTH opposed roll if the target resists).

█▌ARMOR DOUBLED▐█ Target's Armor Rating is doubled against this weapon.

█▌SINGLE SHOT▐█ You must reload (Slow Action) after every shot.
Description: Designed for aiding in emergency manual docking maneuvers, the ASSO-400 fires a grappling-hook-tipped harpoon that carries a tether. The ASSO-400 is used to close the distance between free-floating objects and personnel in space.

Name: XM Plasma Rifle
FullName: Armat XM99A Phased Plasma Pulse Rifle
Comment:
█▌ARMOR PIERCING▐█ Target's Armor Rating is halved (rounded up) against this weapon.

█▌MUST AIM▐█ You must take a Fast Action to carefully aim this weapon before you can fire it.

█▌POWERED▐█ This weapon does not require ammunition, but you must make a Power Supply roll after every shot.
Description: Another prototype being tested by the USCMC, the extremely potent XM99A can kill a man and most creatures with a single shot. The weapon has a plasma charge build-up delay upon firing—so take care in lining up your target and make sure you hold steady. If you pull the trigger and check to see why it hasn't gone off yet, you just may accidentally redefine the term "friendly fire."

Name: Grenade Launcher
Comment: █▌MULTIPURPOSE▐█ This weapon can fire a variety of grenade types: Frag, Smoke, Flash and Electroshock. See the descriptions of each grenade for combat statistics.\n\n█▌ON A MISS▐█ Whenever a grenade misses, it lands in a random adjacent zone.
Description: This 30mm pump-action is typically found as part of the M41A Pulse Rifle, but individual units do exist. Standard payload for the U1 is M40 High Explosive fragmentation grenades, but the launcher accommodates a variety of other grenade types from smoke and flash grenades to electronic G2 Electroshock Grenades. When facing superior numbers, the U1 is your friend—don't enter an alien hive without one. Well, don't enter a hive with one, either. Just stay away from the hive. Okay?

Name: Heavy Pulse Rifle
Comment: █▌ARMOR PIERCING▐█ Target's Armor Rating is halved (rounded up) against this weapon.\n\n█▌FULL AUTO▐█ You can fire long bursts of full auto fire: +1 Stress, +2 Attack, and any additional [6]s beyond the first may be distributed among any number of secondary targets within Short range of the primary target, either to deal full weapon damage and/or to purchase Stunts.
Description: A USCMC Squad Automatic Weapon modification of the M41A, this electric pulse support rifle has a longer barrel in place of the U1 grenade launcher. This is the machinegun you want laying down suppressing fire to cover your ass during an evac.

Name: M56 Smart Gun
Comment: █▌ARMOR PIERCING▐█ Target's Armor Rating is halved (rounded up) against this weapon.\n\n█▌FULL AUTO▐█ You can fire long bursts of full auto fire: +1 Stress, +2 Attack, and any additional [6]s beyond the first may be distributed among any number of secondary targets within Short range of the primary target, either to deal full weapon damage and/or to purchase Stunts.
Description: The heavy firepower of every USCMC squad, the M56 Smartgun is mounted on an articulating arm and gimbal attached to an armored harness worn by the weapon's operator. What makes the M56A2 a smart gun is its ability to choose targets for you. It is equipped with an infrared tracking system and data transmitter/receiver that homes in on potential threats and sends that information to a Head Mounted Sight. Fire control is still at your discretion, so if you are running low on ammo, pick your targets. The M56A2 fires in either bursts or full automatic. A glancing shot can sever a limb and a full burst can cut a person in half, so watch that friendly fire, Private.

Name: M240 Incinerator Unit
Comment: █▌INCENDIARY▐█ Any target hit by this weapon also catches fire, Intensity 9 (attacks with 9 dice each round, +1 per round; fire goes out if no damage is dealt; target or ally at Engaged range can extinguish fire with a Slow MOBILITY roll).
Description: This carbine-style flamethrower uses naphtha fuel canisters to fire a thick, steady stream of flame at a target. It is in common use by the USCMC, who deploy the weapon at the squad and fireteam level. Civilian models exist too. The troops in the field have given the M240 the unceremonious nickname of "Bakea-Flake." It's a good standby weapon to have in a pinch, especially when facing off against hostile organisms. Most animals retreat from fire, yes?

Name: UA 571C Sentry Gun
Comment:
█▌ARMOR PIERCING▐█ Target's Armor Rating is halved (rounded up) against this weapon.

█▌FULL AUTO▐█ You can fire long bursts of full auto fire: +1 Stress, +2 Attack, and any additional [6]s beyond the first may be distributed among any number of secondary targets within Short range of the primary target, either to deal full weapon damage and/or to purchase Stunts.

█▌AUTOMATED▐█ This weapon cannot be wielded. Instead, deploy it in place. While deployed, it is always in Overwatch and fires upon anything that moves in its field of view with 8 dice.
Description: These tripod-mounted robot sentries form an automated perimeter defense system that tracks and automatically fires upon any target that moves within range. The UA 571 series is equipped with automatic thermal and movement actuated AI targeting capabilities. The UA 571-C utilizes an M30 Autocannon. Just be mindful of your friend or foe settings before walking in front of one. Those set up with ARS—Advanced Recognition Software—can be programmed to identify friendly targets with a variable success rate. If set for motion and heat only, anything hot that moves might as well be dead.

Name: Shock Grenade
Comment: █▌AOE STUN▐█ This grenade deals no damage. Instead, all humans in the target zone must make a STAMINA roll with a -2 penalty or be stunned for one Round.\n\n█▌ON A MISS▐█ Whenever a grenade misses, it lands in a random adjacent zone.
Description: These grenades are called "electronic ballbreakers" with good reason. When deployed, they propel themselves about 3 feet off the ground before releasing a mega-voltage electric pulse. The usually non-lethal shock is still strong enough to freeze a person's central nervous system. These weapons are good for crowd control. When there is only one seat left on the last shuttle to leave a space station stuck in a decaying orbit around a gas giant, pop a few of these puppies into the mob, cycle that airlock closed, and strap yourself in for the ride home.

Name: Frag Grenade
Comment: █▌AOE BLAST▐█ This grenade deals one damage to its target, 9 dice of explosion damage to all those in the same zone (including the target), and 3 dice of explosion damage to all those in adjacent zones.\n\n█▌ON A MISS▐█ Whenever a grenade misses, it lands in a random adjacent zone.
Description: The M40 marries cutting-edge subnuclear explosives with 3D-printed depleted uranium aerodynamic shrapnel to unleash a storm of death capable of cutting through just about anything like it was cheesecloth.

Name: Smoke Grenade
Comment: █▌SMOKE▐█ This grenade deals no damage. Instead, it blocks line of sight inside, into, and out of the targeted zone.\n\n█▌ON A MISS▐█ Whenever a grenade misses, it lands in a random adjacent zone.
Description: Use it to signal an air rescue, or to obscure your movement in the field.  Just don't set one off in the mess hall.

Name: Flash Grenade
Comment: █▌FLASHBANG▐█ This grenade deals no damage. Instead, all those in the targeted zone must roll STAMINA (no Action) or lose their next Slow Action.\n\n█▌ON A MISS▐█ Whenever a grenade misses, it lands in a random adjacent zone.
Description: It never ceases to amaze me just how much havoc one can cause with a bright light and a big bang.

Name: Unarmed Attack
Comment: █▌ARMOR DOUBLED▐█ Target's Armor Rating is doubled against this weapon.\n\n█▌BLOCKING▐█ You can ONLY block unarmed attacks from other humans. To block an armed Close Combat attack, or an attack by a creature with natural weaponry, you need to wield something sturdier.
Description: Well, Private, it's not likely that things are going well if you're relying on your own delicate flesh and fragile bones... but what else are you gonna do in a pinch?

Name: Blunt Weapon
Description: With a little reach and a little leverage, just about anything can cave in a skull.

Name: Knife
Description: Humans have been poking things with sharp instruments since the dawn of time, why stop now?

Name: Stun Baton
Comment: █▌STUN▐█ Anyone hit by this weapon who takes one or more damage must make a STAMINA roll (no Action) or be stunned for one Round.\n\n█▌POWERED▐█ This weapon does not require ammunition, but you must make a Power Supply roll after every shot.
Description: Basically a cattle prod, these electroshock devices are designed to keep pests and livestock in order on the Frontier. While the charge isn't strong enough to kill a human, a touch can incapacitate the target. If you see something lurking underfoot, hit it with it. Shouldn't damage the little bastard, unless its skin is thinner than ours...

Name: Cutting Torch
Comment: █▌ARMOR PIERCING▐█ Target's Armor Rating is halved (rounded up) against this weapon.\n\n█▌POWERED▐█ This weapon does not require ammunition, but you must make a Power Supply roll after every shot.
Description: A utilitarian blowtorch used for both welding and cutting through metal. In a pinch, a cutting torch can be used as a weapon. The Rexim EVA pistol started life as a laser cutting torch. You want to stay alive? You need to improvise.
